name: BreakDance (Szym)
description:
Game made in 10 days for the palette Jam 2021 with the theme "Break" and the limited palette Rampy16 on 8 colors.

The games plays like a classic rhythm game with 16 inputs (4 directions X 4 inputs). Controller is highly recommended.

2 player mode supports both 2 controllers or keyboard vs controller.

Controllers Controls:

  • change direction : Left stick or D-pad
  • dance : A/B/X/Y

Keyboard Controls:

  • change direction : Arrows
  • dance : W/A/S/D

Credits:

  • Art, UI, Animations & Fonts : Spookto
  • Music & sounds : ChrisComp - Go check his Soundcloud
  • Development & Gameplay  : Szym
